## Reading in a tidying the data

Reading in the border crossing data:

```{r }
border_crossing_df = read_csv(file = "./Border_Crossing_Entry_Data.csv") %>% janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  separate(date, into = c("date", "time", "am_pm"), sep = " ") %>%
  mutate(date = as.Date(date))
```
